entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzers should be able to detect that a call is intercepted #68669
    Compiler.Next
  • [API Proposal]: New command line option for reporting IVT info #68666
  • Expected value of GetEnclosingSymbol for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax #68661
    17.7
  • Incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzer #68654

Closed

  • Question to synthesized GeneratedNames for yield statement #68542
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33816.152 #68663
  • [BUG] Order Modifiers fixer does not result in any changes via Code Cleanup #68659
  • Roslyn API broke in upgrade from .NET SDK 7.0.302 to 7.0.304 #68638
    17.7 P3
  • [Feature Suggestion]: Allow attribute location `method` on expression-bodied properties #68653
  • IncrementalStepRunReason incorrect for new or removed attributes #68392
    17.7
  • Escape scope analysis won't work with primary constructors #68610
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Omit Slice call when start is 0 and 0 <= end <=length. #68660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect non-local diagnostic classification for VB symbol analyzers #68655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • fix index out of range in generator driver #68668
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in MergedNamespaceSymbol.SlowGetChildNames #68614
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Correctly handle trivia in inline statement snippets #68633
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix msbuild for real this time #68651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68645
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, 17.7
  • VisualStudioProjectFactory: import the solution service once instead … #68630
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Avoid loading Roslyn through All In One Search when Roslyn isn't loaded yet. #68644
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #68623
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
